body:
Have you heard about `RecyclerView`? It is a new way of displaying a list of items that works pretty well with the `ViewHolder pattern`. You could try it on your next project,  please, reference these links to find out advantages and more details:
* https://guides.codepath.com/android/using-the-recyclerview
* https://developer.android.com/reference/android/support/v7/widget/RecyclerView.html
